name: Singular Intelligence
description:
Retail and Consumer sector companies are unable to effectively follow dynamically changing customer and market Context  in the multi-channel world where  small and big data is disparate and disconnected. This is further compounded by a lack of tools with data exploration & predictive simulation functionality, limited in-house capability and technical skills.

Singular SDAX is a cloud-based product  that enables sales and marketing teams to explore & predict through 
data-based simulation and make interventions by:
 - spotting untapped market opportunities at given location(s) and time(s) 
- predicting sales and locate improvement areas
- identifying unique consumer needs and trends

We have launched a Market Ready product in March 2015 after successful pilots of MVP with early adopter customers.

Revenue Streams  include Subscription based revenue and OEM partnerships.This product has cross-sector applications  and would be core to several solutions with multiple revenue streams.

team.name: Sarvesh Kumar
team.bioHtml: Founder & CEO Singular Intelligence Limited • Studied @University of Oxford, @Saïd Business School*AI, Big Data, Analytics, Business Intelligence*Global Exp*

team.name: Jean Littolff
team.bioHtml: Successfully brought to market, developed business and accelerated revenue growth, of emerging operations and innovative solutions.

jobs.title: Data Visualisation & UI Designer and Developer
Senior  ETL Developer / Data Modeller
jobs.description:
4-10 years of total experience
Should have good knowledge of both Relational and dimensional modelling
Should have strong knowledge on any of the ELT tools and concepts
Should have strong skills on SAP Hana, MS SQL server and Python
Should be conversant on both Windows and Linux environment
Should be able to work in the cloud environment.

jobs.title: Senior AI & ML Engineer
jobs.description:
**The role involves working in both Industrial research projects as well as Customer deployable solutions.**
1. You will need to have  education and exprience in AI/ML Modelling -  use data and requirement to model using latest and most optimal techniques ensuring Key performance  requirements and accuracy, reliability, explainability is met.
2. Hands on Modleing as well as programming  for production 
3. Plan and Lead the track from technical perspective with data engineering and UI development, python programmers
4. Interact with Customers directly, technical stakeholders
5. 5-8 years of experience in Analytic (AI /ML)

**You should have demonstrated knowledge and experience with range of AI/ ML/ Statistical modeling  techniques -  Deterministic, Probabilistic, Stochastic,  Heuristic, AI  and OR models**
1. Experience of Data preparation and cleansing
2. Expert level  programming skills in Python
3. At least Basic working knowledge of Databases – Relational as well as Big Database engines having worked on both windows and Linux environments
4. Team Competencies : 
5. A team player and team builder
6. Ability and flair to work with a team of multi-disciplinary expertise
7. Ability and flair to work with a diverse team from different cultures and regions
8. Discipline and efficiency in a Virtual team
9. Flexibility for short term travel
10. Other skills : Use of cloud environment for development and production, Office automation tools, planning tools.

jobs.title: Senior Data Visualisation and Front End programmer
jobs.description:
Experience of 4-8 year in  advanced data visualisation and  front-end development
Knowledge of d3.js (version 3 or version 4)
Ability to properly use the d3.js concepts, e.g., chaining, data joining, etc.
The existing system supports ES5 so the code has to be written in the ES5 standard of JavaScript.
Good knowledge on HTML,CSS, ReactJS and NodeJS
Should be able to deploy the application on Cloud platform
Ability to understand data, design, and convert it into a clean and readable software code.
Should be able to write clean and efficient code
Make necessary changes as per feedback that might not have stated in the design.
Should be able to join in 2-3 weeks’ timeframe in Bangalore or Chennai
Should be able to work independently
